summary: The module implements data handling and training utilities for fine‑tuning a text‑to‑image diffusion model (DreamBooth) using the ColossalAI framework. It defines datasets that combine instance and class images with tokenized prompts, provides simple collate and optimizer helpers, and includes scaffolding for loading model components and orchestrating distributed training of the diffusion pipeline.
business_intent: To enable scalable, multi‑GPU personalization of diffusion models, allowing enterprises or researchers to efficiently train custom DreamBooth models on large datasets with reduced memory and compute overhead.
